  • 5 Days to Deploy - Week 1


  • This week I'm going to play around with some parallax and Jekyll


  • September 04, 2013

Day 1: Wednesday Goals: To work more with parallax and Jekyll Aim: To recreate a page similar to the Spotify homepage, however I want to make it for fashion bloggers who post their photos on to Lookbook.nu

Today I have established the goals and aim for this project. I have also found a couple of articles online which I feel can help me create the effect I am after. Although I haven't created a mockup of what exactly I want to create I have a vague idea of what I would be happy with.
